name: Stupid Raft Battle Simulator
description: Stupid Raft Battle Simulator is a physics based simulator game set during the golden age of piracy. Your goal is to defeat your opponent by eliminating all enemy units on the battlefield.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ Ghz Intel/AMD Dual core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel hd 5500 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
